attributes.action: GRANT WOOTTON BASSETT A ROYAL WARRENT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the citizens of the United Kingdom, wish the goverment to grant a Royal Warrent to the town of WOOTTON BASSETT. In honour of their support, dedication and total respect of our Armed Forces & Families. And to the people of the United Kingdom.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
